    • Constructor Detail

      • Involute

        public Involute(processing.core.PApplet app,
        float radius,
        int sections,
        int index)
        Parameters:
        app -
        radius - the radius of the circumference
        sections - the total number of anchors to be accommodated in the circumference
        index - the index of the VisualAtom in the sequence around the circumference

      • runInvolute

        public void runInvolute(float limit,
               float increment,
               boolean unfolding)
        Runs the involute from the top quadrant down to the limit.
        Parameters:
        limit - The angle in DEGREES that limits the displacement of nodes. Angle 0 is the right quadrant, 90 the bottom quadrant and so on
        increment - The displacement of each node on the circumference
